content: I'm trying to get back into a consistent exercise routine, and I was wondering if you could recommend some yoga classes or studios near my apartment? I've been going to this new studio near my place on Wednesday evenings, and it's been great, but I want to explore other options. By the way, I just got back from a week-long trip to my parents' house during the Christmas holidays, so I'm trying to get back into the swing of things.
